item.title: Solving every Sudoku before breakfast
item.description: TL;DR Just want to see the code? You can find it here on GitHub. Primer A few days ago, I was doing a Sudoku, a puzzle game similar to cross word puzzles, but where the goal is to fill out every cell with a number. Each number has to fulfill the following rules: Each row of numbers must be distinct Each column of numbers must be distinct Each 3x3 square of numbers must be distinct Quite simple, but it can still provide some interesting and challenging problems.
